text: Lalit Prabhakar is an Indian film, television and theatre actor predominantly working in the Marathi film industry. He is best known for his role as Aditya Desai on the popular daily soap Julun Yeti Reshimgathi and his debut film as main actor in the film Chi Va Chi Sau Ka. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Indian actors Category:1987 births Category:People from Maharashtra
title: Lalit Prabhakar
